column4: hello, i have a ZTE mobile 3G modem, it came with Join Air, the connect software by ZTE; i installed Join Air and now i cannot use NetworkManager/MobileManager with my modem to connect to the internet; anyone having experience with this?
i use my 3g connection to connect to internet using pon method, it seems that network manager does not understand that network is connected, and shows a dimond implying not connected
great, that makes two of us :)
so like me you also cannot use evolution
i understand that Join Air uses wvdial which is essentially the same as pon/poff
see i have same problem as you, my network manager shows me no connections, even though i can surf
SNKS, what i do not understand is what is changed so that NetworkManager/ModemManager fails to use my modem
i checked syslog and usb_modeswitch does its thing but then modem manager remains dead silent when it should come in and do its thing
SNKS, i have been searching the web far and wide, but couldn't really find anything useful
same here, i am dying to use evoluytion back
something must be blocking NetworkManager, i just can't find what is
i am using 11.04, too; but i had the same problem with older distros as well
but atleast you can connect to net
let's see if we can get any help here
